sentence.Network_en: "It's a little late for that," Ritter said disgustedly.
sentence.Network_cn: “对那来说有点晚了，”里特厌恶地说。

sentence.Network_en: " Oh, Pa,'she said disgustedly, " you talk like an Irishman! "
sentence.Network_cn: " 啊, 爸, " 她厌恶地说, " 你说这话真像个爱尔兰人哪!
温斯顿满心厌恶地看她们吵架.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disgusted 厌恶的 disgustedly 厌烦地 disgustful 厌腻的.
美国大学翻译中文 19_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 厌恶人类 misanthropy 厌恶地 disgustedly 厌恶女人 misogyny.

list.abs: Demerest thought disgustedly ., 德默雷斯特觉得不是滋味.

entry.def: If you are disgusted, you feel a strong sense of dislike and disapproval at something.

example.ex: I'm  disgusted with the way that he was treated...
example.tran: 他受到如此对待让我气愤。

example.ex: He was disgusted that a British minister could have behaved so disgracefully.
example.tran: 他对一位英国大臣竟有如此丢人的举止感到厌恶。

sentences.sentence: "`Get out of my office,' the professor said disgustedly to the lazy student"
"disgustedly, she averted her eyes when they brought in the mutilated body of the horse"

auth_sentence.content: "I'm going to have to take that whole damn distributor cap off again," he said disgustedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I'm going to have to take that whole damn distributor cap off again," he said disgustedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I'm going to have to take that whole damn distributor cap off again," he said disgustedly.
